comments.body:
If you do the other change this would look a bit different:

```
private[streaming] case class ReceivedBlockInfo(
   streamId: Int,
   storedBlockInfo: StoredBlockInfo,
   numRecords: Long,
   metadata: Any
```
comments.diffHunk:

+
+/** Information about blocks received by the receiver */
+private[streaming] case class ReceivedBlockInfo(
